00059           public function setRemoveUser($user,$set=1){
00060                     
00061                     $zuid=$this->getAccountIdbyName($user['uid']);
00062                     
00063                     // to write less...
00064                     $f=$user;
00065                     
00066                     // Set
00067                     if($set){
00068                               
00069                               // change entries if necessary...
00070                               //$f['']=($f['']);
00071                               
00072                               $soap='';
00073                               if($this->check($f['password'],0))                $soap.='<password>'.$f['password'].'</password>'; // zimbra needs a password.. :(
00074                               if($this->check($f['displayname'],0))   $soap.='<a n="displayName">'.$f['displayname'].'</a>';
00075                               if($this->check($f['fname'],0))                             $soap.='<a n="gn">'.$f['fname'].'</a>';
00076                               if($this->check($f['sname'],0))                             $soap.='<a n="sn">'.$f['sname'].'</a>';
00077                               if($this->check($f['title'],0))                             $soap.='<a n="initials">'.$f['title'].'</a>';
00078                               
00079                               /* #Not needed now
00080                               if($this->check($f['phone'],4))                   $soap.='<a n="telephoneNumber">'.$f['phone'].'</a>';
00081                               if($this->check($f['street'],1))                  $soap.='<a n="street">'.$f['street'].'</a>';
00082                               if($this->check($f['postal'],2,array(0)))                   $soap.='<a n="postalCode">'.$f['postal'].'</a>';
00083                               if($this->check($f['location'],2))                $soap.='<a n="l">'.$f['location'].'</a>';
00084                               if($this->check($f['st'],0))  $soap.='<a n="st">'.$f['st'].'</a>';
00085                               if($this->check($f['staat'],0))                   $soap.='<a n="co">'.$f['staat'].'</a>';
00086                               */
00087                               
00088                               // <-start specific
00089                               
00090                               if($this->check($f['forwarding_email'],0)){
00091                                         
00092                                         // Wenn als forwarding email_adresse die domain (@domain.com) angegeben ist, dann diese löschen, nicht erlaubt.
00093                                         if(strpos($f['forwarding_email'],$this->domain)){
00094                                                   $f['forwarding_email']='';
00095                                         }
00096                                         $soap.='<a n="zimbraPrefMailForwardingAddress">'.$f['forwarding_email'].'</a>';    // zimbraMailForwardingAddress = hidden for user...
00097                               }
00098                               
00099                               // end specific->
00100                               
00101                               // Create
00102                               if($zuid==-1){
00103                                         $what='CreateAccountRequest';
00104                                         
00105                                         if(!$this->check($f['password']))       $soap.='<password>'.dorandompassword().'</password>'; // zimbra needs a password.. :(
00106                                         
00107                                         // <-start specific
00108                                         
00109                                         // generate email alias 
00110                                         if(!$this->checkmail($f['email_alias']) && $f['vname']!='' && $f['nname']!=''){
00111                                                   $f['email_alias'][]=substr($f['vname'],0,1).'.'.$f['nname'].'@'.$this->domain;
00112                                         }
00113                                         // default class of service
00114                                         if($f['cos']==''){
00115                                                   $cos=$this->getCosIdbyName($f['defaultuser']);
00116                                                   if($cos!=-1)                            $soap.='<a n="zimbraCOSId">'.$cos.'</a>';                   
00117                                         }
00118                                         // end specific ->
00119                                         
00120                                         $soap='<name>'.$f['email'].'</name>'.$soap;
00121 
00122                               // Modify
00123                               }else{
00124                                         $what='ModifyAccountRequest';
00125                                         
00126                                         if($soap==''){
00127                                                   $soap='<id>'.$zuid.'</id>'.$soap;       
00128                                         }
00129                               }
00130                               
00131                               // Execute soap
00132                               if($soap!=''){
00133                                         $soap=array($what,$soap);
00134                                         $ret=$this->doadminsoap($soap);
00135                                                  
00136                                         $zuid=$ret['soap:Body']['ModifyAccountResponse']['account']['id'];
00137                               }
00138                               
00139                               // Manage Aliase
00140                               if($f['email_alias']!=''){
00141                                         $this->doAccountAliase($zuid,$f['email_alias'],'user','uid');
00142                               }
00143                     
00144                     // Delete
00145                     }else{
00146                               
00147                               // Nothing to delete
00148                               if($zuid==-1){
00149                                         return array(-1,'User "'.$user['uid'].'" doesn t exist');
00150                                         
00151                               // Delete
00152                               }else{
00153                                         $soap=array('RemoveAccountRequest','<id>'.$zuid.'</id>');
00154                                         $ret=$this->doadminsoap($soap,1);
00155                               }
00156                     }
00157           }

00169           private function check(&$value,$mode){
00170                     if($mode!=0 && ($value=='' || $value==null ))return false;
00171                     if($value=='-'){
00172                               $value='';
00173                               return true;
00174                     }
00175                     switch($mode){
00176                               case 0: if($value=='')return false;
00177                               case 1: if($value=='')return false;
00178                               case 2: if($value=='')return false;
00179                               case 3: if($value=='')return false;
00180                               default: return false;
00181                     }
00182                     
00183           }
00184           
00194           private function dorandompassword(){
00195                     srand(microtime(1));
00196                     return md5(rand());
00197           }

00208           public function setRemoveDistribution($distribution,$set=1){
00209                     
00210                     $zdid=$this->getDistributionIdbyName($distribution['did']);
00211                     
00212                     // Set
00213                     if($set){
00214                               
00215                               // Create
00216                               if($zdid==-1){
00217                                         $soap=array('CreateDistributionListRequest','<name>'.$email.'</name>');
00218                                         
00219                                         $ret=$this->doadminsoap($soap);
00220 
00221                                         if(isset($ret['soap:Body']['CreateDistributionListResponse']['dl']['id'])){
00222                                                   $id=$ret['soap:Body']['CreateDistributionListResponse']['dl']['id'];
00223                                                   
00224                                                   $this->doAccountAliase($did,$distribution['alias'],'dist');
00225                                         }
00226                               // Modify
00227                               }else{
00228                                         // what to modify??
00229                                         //$soap='<a n="...">...</a>';
00230                                         //$soap.='<a n="...">...</a>';
00231                                         
00232                                         $soap=array('ModifyDistributionListRequest','<id>'.$zdid.'</id>'.$soap);
00233                                         
00234                                         $ret=$this->doadminsoap($soap);
00235                                         
00236                                         $this->accountDoAlias($did,$distribution['alias'],'dist');
00237                               }
00238                     
00239                     // Delete
00240                     }else{
00241                               
00242                               // Nothing to delete
00243                               if($zdid==-1){
00244                                         return array(-1,'DistList "'.$distribution['did'].'" doesn t exist');
00245                                         
00246                               // Delete
00247                               }else{
00248                                         $soap=array('DeleteDistributionListRequest','<id>'.$zimbra_uid.'</id>');
00249                                         $ret=$this->doadminsoap($soap,1);
00250                               }
00251                     }
00252           }

00264           public function doAccountAliase($id,$alias,$distlist='user',$idby='name'){
00265                     
00266                     // User Alias
00267                     if($distlist=='user'){
00268                               if($idby=='name'){
00269                                         $zid=$this->getAccountIdbyName($id);
00270                               }else{
00271                                         $zid=$id;
00272                               }
00273                               
00274                               $what='AccountAlias';
00275                     
00276                     // Distribution Alias
00277                     }else if($distlist=='ist'){
00278                               if($idby=='name'){
00279                                         $zid=$this->getDistributionIdbyName($id);
00280                               }else{
00281                                         $zid=$id;
00282                               }
00283                               
00284                               $what='DistributionListAlias';
00285                     }
00286           
00287                     if($zid==-1){
00288                               return array(-1,'Error "'.$id.'" not found');     
00289                     }
00290                     
00291                     foreach($alias as $alias2) {
00292                               $a=substr($alias2,0,1);
00293                               $alias=str_replace(array('+','-'),'',substr($alias2,1)); // Remove all + and -, only first is used.
00294                               
00295                               $soap='<id>'.$zid.'</id><alias>'.$alias.'</alias>';
00296                               
00297                               if($a=='-'){
00298                                         $soap=array('Remove'.$what.'Request',$soap);
00299                               }else{
00300                                         if($a!='+')$alias=$a.$alias;
00301                                         $soap=array('Add'.$what.'Request',$soap);
00302                               }
00303                               
00304                               $this->doadminsoap($soap,1);
00305                     }
00306           }

00338           function UserChangeDistributionlists($uid,$dids){
00339                     
00340                     $zuid=$this->getAccountIdbyName($user['uid']);
00341                     
00342                     if($zuid==-1){
00343                                         return array(-1,'Error "'.$uid.'" not found');
00344                     }
00345                     
00346                     foreach($dids as $did1){
00347                                         
00348                               $a=substr(0,1,$did1);
00349                               $did=str_replace(array('+','-'),'',substr(1,$did1)); // Remove all + and -, only first is used.
00350                               
00351                               $dist=$this->getDistributionbyName($verteilerlistid);
00352                                         
00353                               if($dist['zid']==-1){
00354                                         $err[]=array(-1,'Error "'.$did.'" not found');
00355                                         continue;
00356                               }
00357                               
00358                               $found=in_array($email,$member);
00359                               
00360                               $soap='<id>'.$dist['zid'].'</id><dlm>'.$uid.'</dlm>';
00361                               
00362                               // Action...
00363                               if($a=='-'){
00364                                         if(!$found)continue; // If already not in list continue
00365                                         $soap=array('RemoveDistributionListMemberRequest',$soap);
00366                               }else{
00367                                         if($found)continue; // if already in list continue
00368                                         if($a!='+')$alias=$a.$alias;
00369                                         $soap=array('AddDistributionListMemberRequest',$soap);
00370                               }
00371                               
00372                               $ret=$this->doadminsoap($soap);
00373                     }

00385           function DistributionlistChangeUser($did,$uids){
00386                     
00387                     $dist=$this->getDistributionbyName($verteilerlistid);
00388                                         
00389                     if($dist['zid']==-1){
00390                               return array(-1,'Error "'.$did.'" not found');
00391                     }
00392                               
00393                     $soap_r=''; // remove uids
00394                     $soap_a=''; // add uids
00395                               
00396                     foreach($uids as $uid){
00397                                         
00398                               $a=substr(0,1,$did1);
00399                               $did=str_replace(array('+','-'),'',substr(1,$did1)); // Remove all + and -, only first is used.
00400                               $found=in_array($uid,$member);
00401                               
00402                               // Action...
00403                               if($a=='-'){
00404                                         if(!$found)continue; // If already not in list continue
00405                                         $soap_r.='<dlm>'.$param.'</dlm>';
00406                               }else{
00407                                         if($found)continue; // if already in list continue
00408                                         if($a!='+')$alias=$a.$alias;
00409                                         $soap_a.='<dlm>'.$param.'</dlm>';
00410                               }
00411                     }
00412                     
00413                     if($soap_a!=''){
00414                               $soap=array('AddDistributionListMemberRequest','<id>'.$verteilerlistid.'</id>'.$soap_a);
00415                               $ret=$this->doadminsoap($soap);
00416                     }
00417                     
00418                     if($soap_r!=''){
00419                               $soap=array('RemoveDistributionListMemberRequest','<id>'.$verteilerlistid.'</id>'.$soap_r);
00420                               $ret=$this->doadminsoap($soap);         
00421                     }
00422                     
00423           }

00426           // ready
00427           function getCosIdbyName($cosname){
00428                     
00429                     if($cosname!=''){
00430                               $cachegroup='cosids';
00431                               $cname=$cosname;
00432                               
00433                               $cache=$this->getCache2($cachegroup,$cname);
00434                               if($cache===false){
00435                                         
00436                                         $soap=array('GetCosRequest','<cos by="name">'.$cosname.'</cos>');
00437                                         $ret=$this->doadminsoap($soap);
00438                                         
00439                                         $cache=NULL;
00440                                         if(isset($ret['soap:Body']['GetCosResponse']['cos']['id'])){
00441                                                   $cache=$ret['soap:Body']['GetCosResponse']['cos']['id'];    
00442                                         }
00443                                         $this->setCache2($cachegroup,$cname,$cache);
00444                               }
00445                               $cosid=$cache;
00446                               
00447                               return $cosid;
00448                     }
00449           }

00457                     }else{
00458                               return -1;

00463           function getAccountbyName($name){
00464                     $soap=array('GetAccountRequest','<account by="name">'.$name.'</account>');
00465                     $ret=$this->doadminsoap($soap);
00466                     
00467                     if(isset($ret['soap:Body']['GetAccountResponse']['account'])){
00468                               return $ret['soap:Body']['GetAccountResponse']['account'];
00469                     }else{
00470                               return -1;
00471                     }
00472           }

00474           function getDistributionIdbyName($name,$getlist=0){
00475                     
00476                     $soap='<dl by="name">'.$name.'</dl>'; 
00477                     $found=-1;
00478                     if($getlist==0){
00479                               $soap.='<limit>1</limit>';
00480                     }
00481                     $soap=array('GetDistributionListRequest',$soap);
00482                     
00483                     
00484                     $ret=$this->doadminsoap($soap);
00485                     
00486                     if(isset($ret['soap:Body']['soap:Fault']['soap:faultstring'])){
00487                               
00488                               echo "FEHLER!!";
00489                               
00490                               return $ret['soap:Body']['soap:Fault']['soap:faultstring'];
00491                     }else{
00492                               $id=$ret['soap:Body']['GetDistributionListResponse']['dl']['id'];
00493                               
00494                               if($getlist!=0){
00495                                         return array($id,$ret['soap:Body']['GetDistributionListResponse']['dl']['dlm']);
00496                               }
00497                               
00498                               return $id;
00499                     }
00500           }
